filter_metadata.description: Chartink filter queries organized by trading themes
filter_metadata.notes: Use {cash} for NSE cash market and {33489} for equity filters

intraday_buy.description: Short-term momentum plays for intraday trading

momentum_breakout.name: Momentum Breakout
momentum_breakout.description: Stocks breaking out with volume confirmation
momentum_breakout.query: ( {cash} ( ( {33489} ( latest close > 50 ) and ( latest close < 2000 ) and ( latest volume > 1 day ago volume * 1.5 ) and ( latest "close - 1 day ago close / 1 day ago close * 100" > 1 ) ) ) )

volume_surge.name: Volume Surge
volume_surge.description: High volume activity with price momentum
volume_surge.query: ( {cash} ( ( {33489} ( latest close > 50 ) and ( latest close < 3000 ) and ( latest volume > 1 day ago volume * 2 ) and ( latest "close - 1 day ago close / 1 day ago close * 100" > 0.5 ) ) ) )

gap_up.name: Gap Up Opening
gap_up.query: ( {cash} ( ( {33489} ( latest open > 1 day ago close * 1.02 ) and ( latest close > 50 ) and ( latest close < 2500 ) and ( latest volume > 100000 ) ) ) )

rsi_oversold_bounce.name: RSI Oversold Bounce
rsi_oversold_bounce.query: ( {cash} ( ( {33489} ( latest close > 50 ) and ( latest close < 2000 ) and ( latest rsi( 14 ) < 40 ) and ( latest "close - 1 day ago close / 1 day ago close * 100" > 1 ) ) ) )

high_volume_breakout.name: High Volume Breakout
high_volume_breakout.description: Stocks breaking out with exceptional volume
high_volume_breakout.query:
( {cash} ( ( {33489} ( latest close > 100 ) and 
        ( latest close < 1500 ) and 
        ( latest volume > 1 day ago volume * 3 ) and
        ( latest "close - 1 day ago close / 1 day ago close * 100" > 2 ) ) )

swing_buy.description: 2-10 day position trades with technical setups

trend_continuation.name: Trend Continuation
trend_continuation.query: ( {cash} ( ( {33489} ( latest close > 100 ) and ( latest close < 3000 ) and ( latest sma( close , 20 ) > latest sma( close , 50 ) ) and ( latest "close - 1 day ago close / 1 day ago close * 100" > 1.5 ) ) ) )

support_bounce.name: Support Level Bounce
support_bounce.description: Stocks bouncing from key support levels
support_bounce.query: ( {cash} ( ( {33489} ( latest close > 100 ) and ( latest close < 2500 ) and ( latest close > latest sma( close , 20 ) * 0.98 ) and ( latest rsi( 14 ) > 40 and latest rsi( 14 ) < 70 ) ) ) )

breakout_volume.name: Volume Breakout
breakout_volume.query: ( {cash} ( ( {33489} ( latest close > latest sma( close , 50 ) ) and ( latest close > 100 ) and ( latest close < 3000 ) and ( latest volume > 1 day ago volume * 1.3 ) ) ) )

momentum_consolidation.name: Momentum with Consolidation
momentum_consolidation.description: Stocks showing momentum after consolidation phase
momentum_consolidation.query:
( {cash} ( ( {33489} ( latest close > 200 ) and 
        ( latest close < 2000 ) and 
        ( latest sma( close , 10 ) > latest sma( close , 20 ) ) and
        ( latest rsi( 14 ) > 50 and latest rsi( 14 ) < 75 ) and
        ( latest "close - 5 day ago close / 5 day ago close * 100" > 1 ) ) )

short_term_buy.description: 1-4 week positions with fundamental and technical screening

weekly_momentum.name: Weekly Momentum
weekly_momentum.query: ( {cash} ( ( {33489} ( latest close > 100 ) and ( latest close < 2500 ) and ( latest "close - 5 day ago close / 5 day ago close * 100" > 3 ) and ( latest rsi( 14 ) < 80 ) ) ) )

moving_average_crossover.name: MA Crossover
moving_average_crossover.query: ( {cash} ( ( {33489} ( latest sma( close , 10 ) > latest sma( close , 21 ) ) and ( 1 day ago sma( close , 10 ) <= 1 day ago sma( close , 21 ) ) and ( latest close > 100 ) and ( latest close < 3000 ) ) ) )

long_term_buy.description: Multi-month holdings with value and growth screening

fundamental_growth.name: Fundamental Growth
fundamental_growth.query: ( {cash} ( ( {33489} ( latest close > 200 ) and ( latest close < 5000 ) and ( latest "close - 1 month ago close / 1 month ago close * 100" > 5 ) and ( latest volume > 500000 ) ) ) )

value_with_momentum.name: Value with Momentum
value_with_momentum.query: ( {cash} ( ( {33489} ( latest close > 200 ) and ( latest close < 4000 ) and ( latest pe < 30 ) and ( latest "close - 1 week ago close / 1 week ago close * 100" > 2 ) ) ) )
